comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The NYT of May 29 reports that Cabrera was waiting for orders from Carranza and didn't know if he would be sent to the Peace Conference at Niagara. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A05E1D8173AE6... NYT of June 1, 1914 continues the complex story, with more on Cabrera's activities -- he had gone to Washington by now. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9505E2DA113FE633A...
